name: Pixie
short_description:
Please note, that this software is still under development. The following paragraphs are a description of the planned software, not of the software 'as is'.

Pixie is an AniDB UDP Client written in java and based on the Java AniDB API by grizzlyxp.

Pixie supports file hashing using various hash algorithms, file identification via AniDB, folder monitoring and regex-based moving of files.

The goal of Pixie is to provide a lightweight application that can run on any OS supporting java and allow a high degree of automation.
summary: java client for udp anidb api using Java AniDB API
